N, X = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(N-1):
    if a[i] + a[i+1] > X:
        ans += a[i] + a[i+1] - X
        a[i+1] -= a[i] + a[i+1] - X

print(ans)

def main():
    n, x = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))

    # 左からi番目までの箱の中身の総和をc[i]とする
    c = [0]
    for i in range(n):
        c.append(c[i] + a[i])

    # 左からi番目までの箱の中身の総和をc[i]とする
    # 今いる箱と隣の箱の中身の総和がxを超える場合は，
    # 現在の箱の中身がxになるまで右の箱の中身をそれぞれ１ずつ減らす
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if c[i + 1] - c[i] > x:
            ans += c[i + 1] - c[i] - x
    print(ans)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n, x = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0

for i in range(n-1):
    if a[i] + a[i+1] > x:
        ans += a[i] + a[i+1] - x
        a[i+1] = max(0, a[i+1] - (a[i] + a[i+1] - x))

print(ans)

n, x = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(n - 1):
    if a[i] + a[i + 1] > x:
        count += a[i] + a[i + 1] - x
        a[i + 1] = x - a[i]

print(count)

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N, x = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(N-1):
    ans += a[i]
    if a[i] + a[i+1] > x:
        diff = (a[i] + a[i+1]) - x
        a[i+1] -= diff
        ans += diff

print(ans)
